reference.title: tasktroubleshooting
reference.shortdesc: The <tasktroubleshooting> element provides a troubleshooting section between the <result> and <example> elements in a task topic.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.pre: <steps> . . . </steps> <result>The <uicontrol>User Type</uicontrol> menu updates to display the new types you added.</result> <tasktroubleshooting>If the User Type menu does not display the additions, manually refresh the page.</tasktroubleshooting> <example>For example, you could also do xyz.</example> <postreq>Once completed, you need to consider abc.</postreq>
